predicate.note: Frames file for 'assign' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 13.3, other framed members include allocate, award, concede, grant, promise and vote. Comparison to those. No Framenet entry.

example.name: all args
example.text: It also owns Moody's Investors Service, which assigns credit-ratings to bonds and preferred stock; A.C. Nielsen, known for its data on television-viewing patterns, and Yellow-pages publisher Donnelley.
